source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Art Academy: Game Art Design Essentials Course For Artists
items.headline: Create art using tools such as Blender, Affinity Designer, Affinity Photo, Photoshop, MagicaVoxel, Unity and much more!
objectives_summary: You learn to know Blender
You learn to create 3d art in Blender
You learn to work with Blender's user interface

items.title: Prop modeling and texturing in Maya ZBrush Substance Painter

visible_instructors.title: Rey3D .com
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional instructor of 3D and VFX certified by Autodesk
visible_instructors.name: Rey3D

items.headline: Learn the complete process creating props for games and animation with Maya, ZBrush and Substance Painter 2019
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, you will be able to create your own assets or props with great quality and excellent detail.
Autodesk Maya for inorganic modeling.
ZBrush for assets detailing.

items.title: Create a game asset from start to finish
items.headline: Start from scratch and end with a game asset ready to be imported into your game.
objectives_summary: Design their own game assets
Model them using low poly modeling tecniques
Create the texture coordinates

items.title: TWINMOTION for Architecture | MegaScans | VR | Unreal Engine
items.headline: Produce Cinematic Video Quality with Twinmotion
objectives_summary: Build realistic tropical environment with Twinmotion
Work with free realistic 3D library made by Quixel MegaScans
Produce Photorealistic High-End Cinematic Video and Stills

items.title: Dynamic Male Anatomy for Artists in Zbrush
items.headline: Unleash your Fear of Anatomy and start sculpting believable humans in Zbrush.
objectives_summary: Sculpting échorché model
Sculpting a Male Body with Anatomy
Making Dynamic Pose

items.title: Create Massive Worlds with MEGA Terrains in World Machine
items.headline: Forget about small terrains. Let's build something BIG, REALLY BIG!
objectives_summary: From 0 to the final high resolution export, the process of building large, huge, mega, massive worlds with individual components and how to make variations

items.title: ZBrush 4 R8 New Features

visible_instructors.title: UK Online Training Centre
visible_instructors.job_title: Online training centre based in the UK creative studies
visible_instructors.name: UK Online

items.headline: Learn the new features of ZBrush 4 R8 in this short action packed course for beginners
objectives_summary: What I consider to be the main Features inside ZBrush 4 R8
We will look at the Gizmo Widget
We will cover displacement brushes and there creation

items.title: The Complete Autodesk Navisworks Course (Arabic)

objectives_summary: Manage 3D Construction Models
Navigate through models
Timeliner : Create Construction 4D Simulation.

items.title: Trapcode Form: Making UI Elements

visible_instructors.title: Chad Perkins
visible_instructors.job_title: Filmmaker | VFX Artist | Motion Designer | Composer
visible_instructors.name: Chad

items.headline: A project-based course for Trapcode Form users of all experience levels!
objectives_summary: Learn Trapcode Form by building a fantasy user interface from scratch

items.title: Ultimate character creation in Blender: From beginner to pro
items.headline: The complete guide on how to model, texture and rig professional 3D characters with Blender!
objectives_summary: How to navigate in Blender and recognize the workspace.
Be able to identify the different 3D modeling techniques.
How to place reference images which will serve as a guide to model 3D characters.

items.title: CREATE STAR WAR ROBOT WITH BLENDER AND SUBSTANCE PAINTER
items.headline: How to make realistic Robot by using Blender 2.8 and Substance Painter.
objectives_summary: 1_How to use the powerful modeling tool inside Blender to achieve nice-looking geometry
2_How to unwrap your Robot easily and how to clean your geometry before unwrapping to keep your work easy.
3_How to use vertex paint inside Blender and why you should use it.

items.title: 3ds max for beginners
items.headline: Get the basics of 3ds max and Vray in just 4 days from practitioners with experience in this area 5 years
objectives_summary: basic skills in 3d modeling
Vray materials
enter in CG

items.title: Create Foliage and Trees for Games or Film using SpeedTree

visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive

items.headline: Learn to create amazing grass, trees, bushes and more for your games or films using this powerful software!
objectives_summary: Create stunning foliage using SpeedTree
Learn the basics of texturing grass, trees, bushes, and more as you learn how 3d foliage is made
Learn to work with Maya and CryEngine as you setup the foliage in a game engine for a practical application

items.title: Learn the basics of Fusion 360

visible_instructors.name: Philip

items.headline: Learn how to create your own models in Fusion 360.
objectives_summary: Computer aided design
Fusion 360
sketching

items.title: Creating a Cute Character in Maya and Photoshop
items.headline: Learn modeling techniques as well as UV Mapping, Texturing, Lighting and Rendering in Maya then compositing in Photoshop
objectives_summary: Students will learn 3D modeling, UV Mapping, Texturing, Lighting and Rendering.
Students will also learn how to use Photoshop to create textures and make the final composite.

items.title: Houdini Game Tutorial - Procedural Farm House for Unity

visible_instructors.title: Lucie Lescuyer
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional 3D artist and procedural modeling enthusiast.
visible_instructors.name: Lucie

items.headline: Learn how to create a procedural house tool in Houdini and how to export it as a digital asset in Unity.
objectives_summary: This is a tutorial on how to build a procedural cartoon house in Houdini and how to export it as a digital asset for Unity (It can also apply for Unreal).
